channel.title: BetterListen! Wisdom & Wellness Podcast
channel.description: The Better Listen! Wisdom and Wellness Podcast features ideas and inspiration from some of the world's outstanding thinkers, teachers, authors, and healers. Download podcasts here and visit BetterListen.com to connect with your self and our online community.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ideas, tools & media for a better world
channel.itunes:author: BetterListen
channel.itunes:summary: The Better Listen! Wisdom and Wellness Podcast features ideas and inspiration from some of the world's outstanding thinkers, teachers, authors, and healers. Download podcasts here and visit BetterListen.com to connect with your self and our online community.

item.title: Wisdom and Wellness Podcast November .1
